code: import React,{useRef}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var FileExplorerButton=function FileExplorerButton(){var fileInputRef=useRef(null);var handleFileSelection=function handleFileSelection(){fileInputRef.current.click();};var handleFileChange=function handleFileChange(event){var selectedFile=event.target.files[0];console.log("Selected File:",selectedFile);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",ref:fileInputRef,style:{display:"none"},onChange:handleFileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleFileSelection,children:"Upload File"})]});};export default FileExplorerButton;
